p: In this test, vincristine sulfate and DMSO (dimethyl sulfoxide) were used as the positive control and the negative control respectively to measure the cytotoxicity. The LC 50 values for the positive control and the methanol extract of M. peguensis leaves were found to be 0.451 μg/mL and 1.094 μg/mL respectively and were represented in Fig. 4.
